locations.name: Tempelhofer Feld (Tempelhofer Damm)
locations.description: Large open field with designated BBQ areas near the main entrance
locations.expat_notes: Peak season Apr-Oct. Can get crowded on weekends. Bring your own charcoal and lighter fluid. Free parking available along Tempelhofer Damm.

locations.name: Tempelhofer Feld (Oderstraße)
locations.description: Designated BBQ area near Oderstraße entrance, less crowded alternative
locations.expat_notes: Quieter than main entrance. Better for families. U-Bahn accessible via Leinestraße (U8).

locations.name: Görlitzer Park
locations.description: Popular park with two designated BBQ areas, vibrant atmosphere
locations.expat_notes: Very social atmosphere, great for meeting other expats. Can be busy and loud. Security present. Near Görlitzer Bahnhof (U1).

locations.name: Volkspark Friedrichshain
locations.description: Large park with designated grilling areas, reservation recommended
locations.expat_notes: Online reservation required during peak season (check neuerhain.de). Quiet, family-friendly. Plenty of shade. Tram access via M10, M4.

locations.name: Monbijoupark
locations.description: Small central park with BBQ area and views of Museum Island
locations.expat_notes: Small but scenic location. Great for dates or small groups. Limited space, arrive early. Walking distance to Hackescher Markt (S-Bahn).

locations.name: Mauerpark
locations.description: Historic park with BBQ areas, famous for Sunday flea market
locations.expat_notes: Combine with Sunday flea market visit. Very international crowd. Limited BBQ spots, book early. Near Eberswalder Straße (U2).
